body:
Wednesday, April 26 at 12 PM, PA Dance Studio 218

CTA = Medi-Cal Redeterminations – Find out if you’re effected! RSVP today or call with questions!Description: Since the start of the COVID-19 pandemic, California received an increase in Medicaid funding under the conditions that disenrollments would be postponed for as long as the federal COVID-19 public health emergency (PHE) remained active, which allowed millions of Californians to remain on Medi-Cal during the unprecedented health crisis.

However, with the Federal Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2023, Medicaid continuous coverage requirements are no longer tied to the PHE and continuous coverage terminates on March 31st. Find out what to expect and whether you are at risk of losing coverage.
